div.head: Description of changes for 2013.01
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft started fromm a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne text still needs to be completed. Corrections and additions will follow a collation comparison of available manuscript witnesses. Cross-references, ccitations, and a critical apparatus still need to be constructed.
